name: Groot

abilities.name: Vine Strike
abilities.details: Launches vines to attack enemies. Reloads after 8 shots.

abilities.name: Spore Bomb
abilities.details: Throws an explosive Spore Bomb that splits into 6 smaller spores on impact.

abilities.name: Thornlash Wall
abilities.details: Grow a wall (250 HP). Awakened: Strikes enemies attacked near it.

abilities.name: Ironwood Wall
abilities.details: Grow a durable wall (700 HP). Awakened: Grants Groot Bonus Health (40/s up to 250) when allies deal damage near it.

ultimate.name: Strangling Prison
ultimate.effect: Pulls enemies to center & Imprisons for 3.5s.
ultimate.details: Fires a massive vine projectile creating an imprisoning field.

passives.name: Flora Colossus
passives.details: Walls near Groot 'Awaken', activating bonus effects. Range: 20m radius.

passives.name: Furious Flora
passives.details: Melee combo (~30/30/50 damage). Third strike launches enemy airborne slightly.

teamups.effect: They can ride on Groot's shoulders gaining Damage Reduction. +150 Max Health for Groot.

lore: A Flora Colossus hailing from Planet X. Groot is a loyal guardian with incredible regenerative abilities and control over plant life. Often seen with his companion, Rocket Raccoon.
